description: A cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Jenkins Warnings Next Generation Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier in src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/model/DetailsTableModel.java, src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/model/SourceDetail.java, src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/model/SourcePrinter.java, src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/util/Sanitizer.java, src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/warnings/DuplicateCodeScanner.java that allows attackers with the ability to control warnings parser input to have Jenkins render arbitrary HTML.
